verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* spake unto Moses , saying ,

Command the children of Israel , and say unto them, My offering , \add and\add* my bread for my sacrifices made by fire , \add for\add* a sweet savour unto me, shall ye observe to offer unto me in their due season.\f + \fr 28.2 \ft a sweet…: Heb. a savour of my rest\f*

And thou shalt say unto them, This \add is\add* the offering made by fire which ye shall offer unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; two lambs of the first year without spot day by day , \add for\add* a continual burnt offering.\f + \fr 28.3 \ft day by day: Heb. in a day\f*
The one lamb shalt thou offer in the morning , and the other lamb shalt thou offer at even ;\f + \fr 28.4 \ft at even: Heb. between the two evenings\f*
And a tenth \add part\add* of an ephah of flour for a meat offering , mingled with the fourth \add part\add* of an hin of beaten oil.
\add It is\add* a continual burnt offering , which was ordained in mount Sinai for a sweet savour , a sacrifice made by fire unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And the drink offering thereof \add shall be\add* the fourth \add part\add* of an hin for the one lamb : in the holy \add place\add* shalt thou cause the strong wine to be poured unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add for\add* a drink offering.

And the other lamb shalt thou offer at even : as the meat offering of the morning , and as the drink offering thereof, thou shalt offer \add it\add*, a sacrifice made by fire , of a sweet savour unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. \p
¶ And on the sabbath day two lambs of the first year without spot , and two tenth deals of flour \add for\add* a meat offering , mingled with oil , and the drink offering thereof:
\add This is\add* the burnt offering of every sabbath , beside the continual burnt offering , and his drink offering. \p
¶ And in the beginnings of your months ye shall offer a burnt offering unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; two young bullocks , and one ram , seven lambs of the first year without spot ;
And three tenth deals of flour \add for\add* a meat offering , mingled with oil , for one bullock ; and two tenth deals of flour \add for\add* a meat offering , mingled with oil , for one ram ;

And a several tenth deal of flour mingled with oil \add for\add* a meat offering unto one lamb ; \add for\add* a burnt offering of a sweet savour , a sacrifice made by fire unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And their drink offerings shall be half an hin of wine unto a bullock , and the third \add part\add* of an hin unto a ram , and a fourth \add part\add* of an hin unto a lamb : this \add is\add* the burnt offering of every month throughout the months of the year.
And one kid of the goats for a sin offering unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall be offered , beside the continual burnt offering , and his drink offering. \p
And in the fourteenth day of the first month \add is\add* the passover of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
And in the fifteenth day of this month \add is\add* the feast : seven days shall unleavened bread be eaten.
In the first day \add shall be\add* an holy convocation ; ye shall do no manner of servile work \add therein:\add*

But ye shall offer a sacrifice made by fire \add for\add* a burnt offering unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; two young bullocks , and one ram , and seven lambs of the first year : they shall be unto you without blemish :
And their meat offering \add shall be of\add* flour mingled with oil : three tenth deals shall ye offer for a bullock , and two tenth deals for a ram ;
A several tenth deal shalt thou offer for every lamb , throughout the seven lambs :
And one goat \add for\add* a sin offering , to make an atonement for you.
Ye shall offer these beside the burnt offering in the morning , which \add is\add* for a continual burnt offering.

After this manner ye shall offer daily , throughout the seven days , the meat of the sacrifice made by fire , of a sweet savour unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: it shall be offered beside the continual burnt offering , and his drink offering.
And on the seventh day ye shall have an holy convocation ; ye shall do no servile work. \p

¶ Also in the day of the firstfruits , when ye bring a new meat offering unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, after your weeks \add be out\add*, ye shall have an holy convocation ; ye shall do no servile work :
But ye shall offer the burnt offering for a sweet savour unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; two young bullocks , one ram , seven lambs of the first year ;
And their meat offering of flour mingled with oil , three tenth deals unto one bullock , two tenth deals unto one ram ,
A several tenth deal unto one lamb , throughout the seven lambs ;
\add And\add* one kid of the goats , to make an atonement for you.
Ye shall offer \add them\add* beside the continual burnt offering , and his meat offering , (they shall be unto you without blemish ) and their drink offerings.
